entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
